name: Vivre le Japon
contact_email: Very nice apartment of contemporary Japanese architecture, located a few hundred yards from the Silver Pavilion. From its huge terrace, the view of Kyoto and Mount Yoshida is breathtaking. In summer you can eat on the terrace, overlooking the famous "Philosophers' Way" and its 500 cherry trees. Lobby, lounge, high-tech kitchen, 3 bedrooms (one Japanese tatami room and two European rooms), 2 bathrooms (one European and one Japanese). Huge living room with a grand piano.
